SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client

Class ClientApp

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.am49.client.ClientApp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Client, Remote
public class ClientApp extends Object implements Client
The main client application class that handles the client-side logic for the game.
